author: Salim Ahmed Khan
comment: For using services  a registration to be done but when I try enter Emirates I'd number in proper format there is pop up enter Emirates ID

reply.author: Ministry of Interior U.A.E.
reply.content:
Dear Valued Customer,
To enter your Emiratis ID in proper format you must enter numbers without spaces or dashes, We are happy to give you any needed support, Kindly contact our call center by calling 8005000 or you may visit our website www.moi.gov.ae and try our live chat support, Thank you.

Dear Valued Customer,

author: Naqash Ul Islam
comment: This App is outstanding. But it not showing my electronic licence 5 days after i got it. For first 5 days it was showing
how can companies use this app

reply.author: Ministry of Interior U.A.E.
reply.content:
Dear Valued Customer,
To be able use our  service you must be registered as company representative in the traffic department, Second step is to activate the MOI UAE app to user companies services go to (settings- companies services- click on companies services activation button- enter your companies traffic profile number) . Thank you

You can change language by select (setting - language –then you can select the preferred language) 
For criminal status certificate first click in smart services then select police section then select the criminal status  to apply for it. thank you
